normalized: one month had passed since the washizu material co.
infiltration.
there was no sign that our true identities had been found out by the enemy.
we hadn't suddenly been surrounded by soldiers, or felt any suspicious probing eyes on us.
it wasn't impossible that we were being made to dance on the palm of their hand, but we were leading our school lives more or less quietly and uneventfully.
we hadn't encountered that rubber woman since then, either.

thinking that she may have slipped in among the teachers and students of seishuu academy, we were indirectly checking out the women in the school, recalling her body shape (which was our only clue), but such a nice body was nowhere to be seen.
if anything, shizuru-san's looked like it, but that would hardly be the answer.
at any rate, we still needed to sneak into that washizu material research facility.
while waiting for the firepower for that to arrive, i was working hard at gathering intelligence.
we were in that kind of situation now.
my mind had been restless from early morning on.

i had no ability to foresee the future, but after getting through some difficult situations, i had reached the point where something along the lines of taimanin intuition had started to kick into effect.
according to that intuition, something was going to happen that would completely change the situation up until today.
something not too desirable for me.
i had that sort of premonition.
as usual, i was refuelling with a large helping of curry, so that i would be all right no matter what happened, when morita said something like this.

name: morita
normalized: oi, akiyama, did you hear?
that kamoshita guy from class 1 got recognized as a top achiever.

name: tatsurou
normalized: mm?
what's that?

name: morita
normalized: huh?
you don't even know something like that?!
it's a system where students who have been recognized for their outstanding grades get admitted into the scholarship course in the middle of the term.

name: tatsurou
normalized: they have that kind of thing?

before the infiltration, i had more or less memorized things like seishuu academy's history and curriculum (which was comprised of a general course, scholarship course, maid course and valet course), but i hadn't memorized things that seemed irrelevant to the mission.

name: morita
normalized: that's my dream!
i'm super jealous of that kamoshita guy～!
the elite building looks incredible!
haahh～～…
ignoring my question, morita was grumbling with a moony face.
he normally called them 「those jerks from the elite building」, but was it actually more complex than that?
as a student of seishuu academy, who would already appear to be elite from the outside, was he yearning to be even more elite within it?

name: tatsurou
normalized: （i don't understand that strange frame of mind very well…）
i was born as the son and heir to the prestigious stray blade style, so i was kind of an elite in the taimanin village.
however, the person who had suitable ability for that was not me, but rinko-nee, so it seemed she would become the 49th (and first female) head of the stray blade style family.
furthermore, there was the super-elite yukikaze, who ranked closest to rinko-nee.
i felt like my skill had risen nowadays, but judging by those two, i still had a long way to go――
how have you been?

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh…?
all of a sudden, my shoulder was tapped.
i raised my face due to a familiar voice, and

name: tatsurou
normalized: r, rinko-nee?!
reflexively stood up.
the one who was there was rinko-nee.
and what's more, she was dressed as a maid.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
rinko-nee?
why are…?
eh?
that outfit?!
ehh?
it was the uniform of the seishuu academy maid course.
had rinko-nee also gone undercover as a student, like me?
no, wait――did this mean the “battle” specialist was rinko-nee?
but, this outfit?!

name: rinko
normalized: is, is it strange after all?
rinko-nee looked down at herself, in her maid clothing, like she was a little embarrassed.
no, more importantly than whether it was strange or not…

name: tatsurou
normalized: did you transfer?
you turn up only when it's time for “that”…
i asked, while hesitating about our surroundings.
“that”, of course, referred to the force infiltration.

name: rinko
normalized: it's easier to work this way, isn't it?

name: tatsurou
normalized: then why are you dressed as a maid?!

name: rinko
normalized: eh?
well, it's not that i wanted to dress like a maid at all… the questions on the entrance exam were easy, and… um…
rinko-nee mumbled an excuse.
her eyes were wandering.
she was bad at lying.

name: tatsurou
normalized: you wanted to put that outfit on that much?

name: rinko
normalized: i, i'm telling you, that's not it.
i wasn't attracted to the cute maid clothes or anything like that.
it was by accident.
right, accident.

name: tatsurou
normalized: you are calling them cute maid clothes, though.

name: rinko
normalized: i-i, i'm saying, it's not like that.
don't rib me so much.
your big sister's arrived, right?
be happy about that first, idiot.

name: tatsurou
normalized: uh, well, i am happy, but even so… well, whatever you say.

name: rinko
normalized: uugh…
rinko-nee had turned bright-red, clutching the end of her apron with both hands.
even rinko-nee had a side like this, huh?
moving in to the maid course because she was attracted to the uniform meant she was just like any normal girl over there.
rinko-nee was the successor to the stray blade style, which was handed down at home, in the shinobi village.
i only ever saw rinko-nee constantly focusing her energies on training in our house's dojo.
it seemed even rinko-nee was like this.
i had been sure that, unlike yukikaze, she had no interest in cute outfits for girls, but it seemed that that wasn't quite true.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （anyway…）
she had been saying 『the questions on the entrance exam were easy,』 but there was no way that would be the case.
the level of the scholarship course, the most elite of seishuu academy's elites, was astronomically difficult.
naturally, the entrance exam difficulty for the maid and valet courses, who were destined to support them, was also on a level which far surpassed that of tokyo schools.
even with the general course, where i was, i hadn't passed by my own natural academic ability at all, but by making use of my ninja arts―― in other words, by cheating.
i didn't know whether rinko-nee had passed by merit, or had done the same as me, but it appeared she had wanted to wear those maid clothes quite a bit.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （it seems i'd better not delve too deeply into that area.
i thought, while looking at rinko-nee, who truly didn't seem like rinko-nee, making her cheeks red and becoming strangely restless.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （at any rate, an outfit like this is fresh for rinko-nee…）
i unintentionally ended up staring fixedly at her maid appearance.
the maid course students, who i happened to see over here now and then, were girly-girls, appropriate for their age, and they seemed really cute.
rinko-nee, with her outstanding figure, was very sexy when she wore those same clothes, and so the impression of a naughty maid was hanging in the air.
any man would want to be looked after by a maid like this.

name: rinko
normalized: ta, tatsurou…

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?

name: rinko
normalized: d, don't stare like that, idiot… it's embarrassing, you know…?

name: tatsurou
normalized: ah, s, sorry.
being shyly told off by rinko-nee, i also ended up blushing.

name: rinko
normalized: does an… outfit like this not suit me after all?
rinko-nee asked, while taking glances at me with upturned eyes.
that un-rinko-nee-like behaviour was quite innocent-looking.

name: rinko
normalized: that's right, isn't it…?
even if i dress up like this…
perhaps because she had gotten the wrong impression from me unthinkingly staring at her, rinko-nee hung her head forlornly.

name: tatsurou
normalized: it's not like that!
i unconsciously let out a loud voice, and

name: rinko
normalized: eh…?
rinko-nee suddenly lifted her face.

name: tatsurou
normalized: uh…

name: rinko
normalized: ah…
my eyes happened to meet hers, and we both suddenly became embarrassed and looked away from each other.

name: tatsurou
normalized: ah… i, i mean… it suits you well.
it's great, rinko-nee.
i-i… really like it…
i mumbled an explanation.

name: rinko
normalized: is, is that so?
good.
rinko-nee began to smile gently.

name: rinko
normalized: yeah, good.
she nodded once again, as if to confirm her happiness.
i had never seen a smiling face like this on rinko-nee.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （hang on, rinko-nee.
suddenly you appear dressed like that, and suddenly you're extremely cute.
what the hell happened?
it was the first time my heart had pounded like this because of rinko-nee.
then, i once again raised my face to look carefully at rinko-nee's maid outfit, and
a strange man was standing there, as if to wedge himself in between me and rinko-nee.
rinko-nee backed away in surprise.

name: rinko
normalized: goshujin-sama (master).

name: tatsurou
normalized: （eh?
what did she say just now?
goshujin-sama?
i looked at the guy's face due to the unbelievable word that had come out of rinko-nee's mouth.
the look in his eyes was dreadfully unpleasant.
judging from the colour of his uniform, he looked like a student from a higher grade.

name: man
normalized: rinko, i thought i told you.
though we may be students, we have a master-and-servant relationship.
what are you chatting on your own authority for?

name: rinko
normalized: i apologize, goshujin-sama.
rinko-nee bowed her head deeply.

name: man
normalized: is this your little brother?
he looked at me with unconcealed disdain.

name: rinko
normalized: yes, that's right.
rinko-nee nodded obediently.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （what's with this guy?!
the upperclassman who had suddenly appeared.
that haughty attitude.
rinko-nee just obeyed him.
anger rose up faster than surprise.

name: tatsurou
normalized: r, rinko-nee?!
who is this…?

name: rinko
normalized: ah.
this is kuroi ryuuji-sama, who will be my master while i'm a student.

name: tatsurou
normalized: master?!
rinko-nee's answer was unbelievable.
i was about to ask her something back, when that kuroi guy opened his mouth.

name: kuroi
normalized: valet course students are assigned to the female students on the scholarship course, and maid course students to the males.
you don't even know something like that?
rinko, your little brother is hopelessly stupid, isn't he?

name: tatsurou
normalized: wha?!

name: kuroi
normalized: if the sister's not bright, the brother won't be either, huh?

name: rinko
normalized: …i apologize, goshujin-sama.
obviously, i at least knew about the scholarship course.
i was fine with him saying i was an idiot.
i had gotten in by cheating, after all.
what i couldn't tolerate was this guy's attitude towards rinko-nee.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （how dare you, to my rinko-nee――?!

name: rinko
normalized: tatsurou!
rinko-nee briefly, but sharply, called my name.
i suddenly came back to my senses because of that.
i had unconsciously been about to use my anti-demon power.
that was close.

name: morita
normalized: oi, akiyama.
probably having sensed some alarming sign from me, morita pulled my arm.

name: morita
normalized: moron!
that person is the famous kuroi-senpai, you know?!
i heard from a senior i know that he's like the boss of this school's delinquents, and he's super scary.

name: tatsurou
normalized: all the same, that way of speaking to rinko-nee…
i said, intending to object not to morita, but to kuroi.

name: morita
normalized: that's what a master and maid are!
living their time as students in a mock master-and-servant relationship is schoolwork!
kuroi just made a faint smile, seeming to want to say 『you moron.
i gazed at rinko-nee, and she looked at me and nodded slightly.
with her eyes, she was saying, “i'm putting up with it.
you endure it too.
if the system was like that, i had no choice but to keep silent.
i couldn't waste rinko-nee's efforts.
even so, this was a truly ridiculous aristocratic education.

name: kuroi
normalized: let's go, rinko.
finally, after once again looking at me with the kind of eyes that one would use to look at an insect, kuroi turned around.

name: rinko
normalized: yes, goshujin-sama.
rinko-nee nodded obediently, in a maid-like way,

name: rinko
normalized: maybe next time.
then smiled, and secretly slipped me a note.

name: rinko
normalized: please take care of my little brother.
after calling out to morita as well, she followed kuroi.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （shit… why rinko-nee, with a guy like that…）
i understood, but i couldn't accept it.
i had seen pairings of scholarship students and maids over here a few times, but i got the feeling there hadn't been anyone that horrible.
kuroi ryuuji?
the school's gang leader?!
it appeared that rinko-nee had been turned into the maid of the worst possible man.
my premonition had been on the mark.
this was a seriously undesirable situation.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （what the hell do i do after this…?

name: morita
normalized: whooaa!
shut up.
morita was shouting all of a sudden.

name: morita
normalized: oi, akiyama!
y-y-y-y-y-you are one great guy!
i never thought you'd have such an amazing sister!

name: tatsurou
normalized: oh, yeah…

name: morita
normalized: did you hear that?!
she entrusted you to me!
“please take care of my little brother, sieg!

name: tatsurou
normalized: who's sieg?!

name: morita
normalized: don't worry about it!
i'll look after you to the very end!
i'm gonna dye my hair red!

name: tatsurou
normalized: yeah, yeah…
ignoring the idiot who was getting excited off on his own, i looked at the note that i had been handed by rinko-nee.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （tonight, 2400.
location: shizuru-san's room…?
a strategy meeting, huh?

name: tatsurou
normalized: （i'll be able to meet rinko-nee again tonight…!
i was happy about that, of course.
but, at the same time, i couldn't help but harbour self-loathing.
because i had been unable to resist shizuru-san's temptations ever since the night after that happened.
even though i had rinko-nee, i had been continuing the relationship that had blossomed with shizuru-san.
did i have any right to be jealous of that kuroi?

name: tatsurou
normalized: （i have to do something about the matter with shizuru-san…）

name: tatsurou
normalized: （because rinko-nee's the one i…）
i looked at the note i had been handed once again.
however, the note, which had been written in a special ink, had already disappeared upon touching the air.
